metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38850 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The MPlayer Project mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1 is vulnerable to Divide By Zero via the function config () of llibmpcodecs/vf_scale.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38850` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
mplayer - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1').
